channel.title: Geovanny Cordero Valverde - Blog
channel.description: Insights, articles, and updates on software development, technology, and leadership from Geovanny Cordero Valverde, a Full-Stack Software Engineer based in Costa Rica.

item.title: Getting Payback from Generative AI: Webinar Summary
item.description: Key insights from MIT Sloan's webinar on implementing generative AI in business. Learn practical strategies for small companies to leverage LLMs effectively while managing costs and risks.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: How to Give Effective Feedback
item.description: Learn the essential steps and techniques for providing both positive and corrective feedback effectively. Master the art of constructive communication that drives team improvement and personal growth.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Dozen Canons of Conduct in Life
item.description: Explore Thomas Jefferson's timeless twelve canons of conduct and discover how these 18th-century principles can be adapted and applied to modern life and professional development.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Rails Services: Encapsulating Business Logic
item.description: Learn how to implement the Service Object pattern in Ruby on Rails to encapsulate business logic, improve code organization, and enhance testability. Includes practical examples and testing strategies.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Greatest Common Divisor: From Numbers to Strings in Go
item.description: Explore the mathematical concept of Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) and learn how to implement efficient algorithms in Go for both numbers and strings. Includes practical examples and performance considerations.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Dynamic Programming: Concept
item.description: Dynamic programming is a method used in computer science and mathematics to solve complex problems by breaking them down into smaller, individualized sub problems. Learn the fundamentals with the classic Fibonacci sequence example.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Code Katas: Improving Programming Skills Through Practice
item.description: Discover how code katas can improve your programming skills through deliberate practice and repetition. Explore the best platforms and resources to start your coding practice journey.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Move an RDS Database from One AWS Account to Another
item.description: Learn how to migrate a PostgreSQL RDS database between AWS accounts using EC2, S3, and pg_dump/pg_restore tools. A step-by-step guide for databases under 100GB.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Install Ruby on Mac OS with M2 Chip
item.description: Learn how to install older Ruby versions on Mac OS Sonoma with M2 chip using asdf version manager. A practical guide for developers working with legacy Ruby projects.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)

item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog where I share insights about technology, software development, and interesting topics from my journey as a Full-Stack Software Engineer.
item.author: geovanny@pm.me (Geovanny Cordero Valverde)
